Emad Atiya Ali El-Bahat (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1970), bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na odee ihe nkiri n'Ijipt, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka maka mgbasa ozi, ihe ngosi na ọtụtụ ise ihe nkiri mba ọzọ na Ijipt

Mmasị Emad Elbahat nwere n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mere ka ọ zute atọ n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ndị kachasị mkpa n'Ijipt, Youssef Chahine, n'ezie, Elbahat bụ onye Daoud Abd El-Sayyed na Yousri Nasr Allah kacha emetụta.

Na mbido afọ ndị 1990s, Elbahat nwere mmasị na ihe nkiri nnwale, ọ chịrị dị ka onye na-enyere Daoud Abd El-Sayyed na Yousri Nasr Allah aka, ndị nduzi abụọ ahụ bụ ezigbo ntọala nke ọrụ ihe nkiri Elbahat n'ọdịnihu

Ka e mesịrị, Emad Elbahat bụ otu n'ime ndị nduzi ole na ole nwere ihu ọma ịnụ, iku ume ma hụ ihe nkiri site n'anya otu n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ndị a ma ama na Egypt na ụwa, Youssef Chahine, ruo ugbu a na-ewere ya dị ka nna nna nna Elbahat, a maara ya dị ka onye enyemaka mbụ maka ihe nkiri Chahine, Sokoot Hansawar (2001), Alexandria-New-York (2003).

N'afọ 2004, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ nduzi nke ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Hide and Seek, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2006. Ihe odide ahụ nwetara onyinye site n'alks French Centre National de la Cinématographie (CNC) na Carthage Film Festival na Tunisia ma nweta nyocha magburu onwe ya na mmemme ihe nkiri Cairo na mmemme ihe ngosi Dubai n'otu afọ ahụ (2006)
N'afọ 2007, Elbahat mechara gbaa ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya The Clown, o dere ma duzie.
Ihe nkiri ahụ gosiri Haitham Ahmed Zaki, Ahmed salary, Fathi Abdel Wahab, Sawsan Badr, Heidi Karam, We have, Abdullah Musharraf

Ihe nkiri ahụ na-agbagharị n'okpuru ihe ngosi banyere onye na-eme ihe ọchị na circis, onye na-eche ezigbo nsogbu ihu na-ebibi ndụ ya dị mfe, ihe nkiri ahụ na'enyocha site na njirimara a nke "The Clown", nsogbu nke mmegbu na ọchịchị aka ike nke a na-enye ụfọdụ ndị nkịtị, na-ekpughe ọtụtụ nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na mmasị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nye ndị Ijipt
Ihe nkiri Emad na Mohamed Al-Fekki, nke Emad Elbhatt duziri, nke Al-Arabia Company mepụtara maka mmepụta na nkesa ihe nkiri.
Sharif na Leila bụ di na nwunye ndị ọha mmadụ, ndị nne na nna na ndị ikwu jụrụ n'ihi na mmekọrịta ha nke iwu machibidoro
Ọ malitere tupu afọ alụmdi na nwunye, ha zutere ezigbo ndị enyi ha iji mee emume alụmdi na ụba ha
Ndị enyi ha, Yossef bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ka si France lọta Mgbe agụmakwụkwọ were afọ atọ, onye bụbu enyi ya nwanyị Dr

Salma sitere n'ezinụlọ na-agbaso omenala, a zụlitere ya na Saudi Arabia, Mustafa, onye nta akụkọ siri ike na Yahya, onye bụ onye bụbu onye isi ụgbọ mmiri, na-atụ aro igwu egwuregwu, ilọ ụwa, ebe onye ọ bụla n'ime ha na-eme ka onye ọzọ ka ọ na-ahụ ya, na-ekpughe akụkụ nke àgwà ya, ma ọ bụ ihe ọjọọ ma ọ bụ nke ọma, ha na-egwuri egwu ruo mgbe abalị gwụsịrị Ahmad Yahya, Sarah Bassam, Amidi, Issah, Amir Nabil Rams.
Cairo Film Festival competition, 2006 Dubai film festival, 2006 Akwụkwọ edemede ahụ nwetara onyinye site na French Centre National de la Cinématographie (CNC) na Carthage Film Festival, Tunisia, 2004
